name: Blasteron
description: Shoot your way through hundreds of drones, space mines, and asteroids while avoiding black holes and defending against a galaxy eating extra-dimensional creature.  Blasteron is a multi-directional shoot 'em up with lots and lots of drones. Blasteron, the devourer of galaxies, has convinced many that his dark energy is the path to a better future.  Instead these energy sources allow him to enter this dimension.  You must take back all of the energy sources and destroy Blasteron.
